pages.text: You will encounter three different types of non-Vanilla crafting:$(br2)$(li)$(l:crafting/pyres)Pyre$() ritual crafting$(li)$(l:crafting/fey_crafter)Fey crafting$() with an an activated $(l:crafting/grove_stone)grove stone$().$(li)$(l:crafting/runic_crafter)Runic crafting$() allows for easier automation but also requires a $(l:crafting/grove_stone)grove stone$().$(li)$(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle)Mortar & Pestle$() crafting.$(br2)Most recipes require some form of $(l:resources/introduction)special resources$().

pages.title: Categories
pages.text: There are a number of different categories of crafted items that you can find under $(bold)Subcategories$() in the the main Crafting category.$(li)$(cat:crafting_armor_tools)Armor and Tools$()$(li)$(cat:crafting_devices)Devices$()$(li)$(cat:crafting_decoration)Decorative blocks$()$(br2)Each of these categories lists the relevant items, recipes & uses and any subcategories they may also have.

pages.title: Pyre Ritual Crafting
pages.text: $(cat:herbs)Most herbs$() require a $(l:crafting/pyres)Pyre crafting ritual$() of some kind to create, except those which use $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$() to access the Fey world.$(br2)In addition to herbs, some food items can be cooked "in bulk" on a pyre.$(br2)$(info) Unlike some $(cat:rituals)rituals$(), crafting rituals do not require additional components and are all considered $(l:rituals/tiers)'tier 0'$().

pages.title: Fey Crafting
pages.text: An active $(l:crafting/grove_stone)Grove Stone$() within 10 blocks powers the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(). Activation is through the $(l:rituals/ritual_grove_supplication)Grove Supplication ritual$().$(br2)Recipes have five ingredients, although full stacks of each can be placed in the crafter.$(br2)$(info) Right-clicking with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$() or using a dispenser with a knife begins crafting. Multiple crafts craft will be performed at once for all provided ingredients.

pages.title: Runic Crafter
pages.text: Placed similarly to a fey crafter, the $(l:crafting/runic_crafter)runic crafter$() is capable of automatically pulling ingredients from an inventory below it, based on the item inserted.$(br2)$(info) Items inserted into the runic crafter will appear floating above it. Right-clicking with an empty hand will remove it.$(br2)$(info )A dispenser with a knife can activate a runic crafter.

pages.title: Mortar & Pestle
pages.text: The $(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle)mortar & pestle$() serves a dual purpose: for the $(l:spells/introduction)crafting of spells$() but also for the conversions of items.$(br2)By default, although mod-packs may alter recipes, wheat can be converted into flour, while bones can be converted into bone-meal, and so-on.$(br2)$(info) Instead of requiring 5 of each ingredient, wheat & bone can be done 1 at a time, 2 at a time, etc.

pages.title: Recipes
pages.text: Most recipes can be found through JEI, if installed. Linked below are the categories, although you will need to adjust tabs as required:$(br2)$(li)$(uses:roots:pyre)Pyre rituals & recipes$() are listed here.$(li)$(uses:roots:fey_crafter)Fey crafting recipes$() are listed here.$(li)$(uses:roots:mortar)Spell & general mortar & pestle$() recipes are listed here.$(li)Vanilla crafting recipes are listed in their relevant entries.
